EmailTemplate.name: Start Of Fiscal Year Alert
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Virtual_FEP__c.Account_Name__c} New Fiscal Year
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Virtual_FEP__c.OwnerFirstName},
{!Virtual_FEP__c.Account_Name__c}'s new year begins on {!Virtual_FEP__c.Start_Of_Fiscal_Year__c}. You may wish to request their new financials.
This notification has been sent because of the date that is saved in the customer's Virtual FEP which you can view here.
If this date {!Virtual_FEP__c.Start_Of_Fiscal_Year__c} is not today's date, you will receive another notification on the date which is displayed.
